meanings.sent1: She reweaved the torn fabric skillfully.
meanings.sent2: After the storm, she reweaved the damaged basket.
meanings.sent3: The spider reweaved its web after it was accidentally destroyed.
meanings.sent4: He reweaved the intricate pattern of lies to cover his tracks.
meanings.sent5: The artist reweaved the colors in the painting to create a new masterpiece.

meanings.sent1: Grandma reweaved the old rug to make it look new.
meanings.sent2: The tailor reweaved the torn sleeve back together.
meanings.sent3: The magician reweaved the torn newspaper into a whole one.
meanings.sent4: She reweaved the friendship bracelet to fix the broken strand.
meanings.sent5: The athlete reweaved the shoelaces before the big race.
